Topic.Title: gop debt ceiling tantrum, posturing & hypocrisy. And why? the Constitution says the bills must be paid

Message.Msg: Gee, here I thought budgets went up and down. You mean they only go up? Hmmm. Of course that's great for the money lending usurious shylocks that control BOTH parties. The show put on by congress would be funny if it weren't so deadly serious for this country.
Dumber and dumber all the time.
